story: 005 is a 2D arcade game, one of the first games with stealth elements. The main hero is Agent 005 - he must deliver secret attache cases to an awaiting helicopter. He makes his way through various buildings and warehouses, and avoids enemies. Opponents are using flashlights - the player can sneak around in the dark. In other locations the player must escape from opponents - he can throw special objects that immobilize them. After a successful escape, the player gets to the helicopter.
